sentences.english: The position of Huang Yuji in the history of bibliography science is not to be ignored.
sentences.chinese: 黄虞稷在目录学史上的地位不容忽视。

sentences.english: This article takes a serious recall and reflection on the bases of bibliography.
sentences.chinese: 对目录学基点问题，作了一次认真的回顾与探索。

sentences.english: These environments have offered the good condition for development of bibliography.
sentences.chinese: 这些环境为目录学的发展提供了良好的条件。

sentences.english: In the digital age, the environment of Bibliography has changed a lot.
sentences.chinese: 数字时代，目录学的生存环境发生了深刻变化。

sentences.english: The transforming trends of bibliography in the 21st century are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文章还讨论了21世纪目录学的发展转向。

sentences.english: Third, the bibliography achievement based on document.
sentences.chinese: 三是以文献为基础的目录学成就。

sentences.english: This school spared no efforts to criticize the narrow-sensed collation and bibliography.
sentences.chinese: 这一学派激烈批评狭义校雠学及目录学。

definition: study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer

the Thirteen Confucian Classics, namely: Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], Book of History 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], Rites of Zhou 周禮|周礼[Zhou1 li3], Rites and Ceremonies 儀禮|仪礼[Yi2 li3], Classic of Rites 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], Mr Zuo's Annals 左傳|左传[Zuo3 Zhuan4], Mr Gongyang's Annals 公羊傳|公羊传[Gong1 yang2 Zhuan4], Mr Guliang's Annals 穀梁傳|谷梁传[Gu3 liang2 Zhuan4], The Analects 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], Erya 爾雅|尔雅[Er3 ya3], Classic of Filial Piety 孝經|孝经[Xiao4 jing1], Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3]
